title: Deuteronomy
content:
The Book of Deuteronomy

Purpose

To repeat and provide more details about the covenant prior to Mosesâ€™ death and the Israelites' entry into the promised land

Author

Moses, according to tradition

Date

Likely either 1406 BC or 1230 BC

Setting

The Israelites are about to enter the promised land, and Moses is nearing the end of his life
